resources.string:
Net income: %1$s
 	Total gained: %2$s
 	Total lost: %3$s
 	Average profit per day: %4$s

EARNINGS
 
 Search bar
 Filters the list for all earnings that contain the given keyword(s).
 
 Separate multiple keywords with "," to search for all earnings that contain all given keywords.
 
 List of earnings
 Displays all (or filtered) earnings.
 
 Tap an earning to edit it.
 Tap and hold an earning to delete it.
 
 "+" button
 Tap this button to add a new earning.

EDIT EARNING
 
 Date Picker widget
 Use the widget to select a date.
 You can tap the day/month/year to manually enter a value.
 
 Source
 Dropdown menu: select the source of the earning.
 "+" button: add/delete sources.
 
 Amount earned
 Enter the amount earned (maximum 2 decimal places).
 
 Additional information
 Additional information can be entered here (not required).
 
 Save button
 Tap this button to save.

EARNINGS SOURCES
 
 Search bar
 Filters the list for all sources of earnings that contain the given text.
 Doubles as the field for entering the name of a new source.
 
 "ADD" button
 Adds the contents of the search bar as a new source.
 
 List of sources
 Displays all (or filtered) sources of earnings.

EXPENSES
 
 Search bar
 Filters the list for all expenses that contain the given keyword(s).
 
 Separate multiple keywords with "," to search for all expenses that contain all given keywords.
 
 List of expenses
 Displays all (or filtered) expenses.
 
 Tap an expense to edit it.
 Tap and hold an expense to delete it.
 
 "+" button
 Tap this button to add a new expense.

EDIT EXPENSE
 
 Date Picker widget
 Use the widget to select a date.
 You can tap the day/month/year to manually enter a value.
 
 Source
 Dropdown menu: select the source of the expense.
 "+" button: add/delete sources.
 
 Amount earned
 Enter the amount spent (maximum 2 decimal places).
 
 Additional information
 Additional information can be entered here (not required).
 
 Save button
 Tap this button to save.

EXPENSES SOURCES
 
 Search bar
 Filters the list for all sources of expenses that contain the given text.
 Doubles as the field for entering the name of a new source.
 
 "ADD" button
 Adds the contents of the search bar as a new source.
 
 List of sources
 Displays all (or filtered) sources of expenses.

DATE SELECTION
 
 Calendar widgets
 Use the corresponding calendar widgets to select the start and end dates for which the report will detail.
 
 "SELECT TODAY" button
 Sets both calendar widgets to the current date.
 
 "SELECT ALL" button
 Sets the start date calendar to the oldest possible date (1900, Jan. 01).
 Sets the end date calendar to the latest possible date (2100, Dec. 31).
 WARNING: this will often cause the "Average profit per day" text to display \$0.00 due to the large date range.
 
 "GENERATE REPORT" button
 Generates and displays a report of all entries between the two specified dates.

VIEW REPORTS
 
 Title
 Displays the start and end dates for the report chosen in the date selection screen.
 
 Graphs and charts
 Bar graphs display the total amount earned/spent for each date with a recorded entry within the chosen date range.
 Pie charts display the total amount earned/spent for each source of earning/expense with a recorded entry within the chosen date range. The size of each section of the chart is proportional to the contribution of that source towards the total amount earned/spent.
 Switch between bar graphs and pie charts for earnings and expenses by tapping the corresponding tab.
 
 Analysis
 Analysis text such as the net income will be displayed.
 Scroll down to view additional analysis text (CURRENTLY NOT ENOUGH ADDITIONAL INFO TO ALLOW SCROLLING).
